typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	PrimaryKey as string (ID),
	Columns as string ('voornaam,achternaam,geboortedatum')
}
source(output(
		ID as string,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test1
test1 derive(ID_hash = md5(byName($PrimaryKey)),
		Columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashInput
